translation.onboardingDescription1: Connect your crypto wallet and securely store your notes. We're here for a quick and easy start!
translation.onboardingDescription2: Save your thoughts without worry. Secure your notes with blockchain technology.
translation.onboardingDescription3: Choose colors, organize notes, and experience the note-taking journey you've imagined. Your notes, your style!
translation.appDescription: Cipherlog is a mobile application that simplifies the note-taking process and enhances your security. With its minimalist design and intuitive interface, you can quickly and easily take notes.
translation.securityFeature: The app allows you to protect your notes by adding an additional layer of security. By integrating your own crypto wallet, you can ensure high-level security for your notes and track your transactions in the crypto world.
translation.enhancedSecurity: - Enhanced security with crypto wallet integration
translation.keepTrackOfNotes: - Ability to keep personal notes safe and track them
translation.downloadCipherlog: - Download Cipherlog and elevate your note-taking experience to a secure and user-friendly level!
